A version of '''[[Minecraft Indev]]''' was released on '''February 11, 2010''', at 23:40 UTC<ref name=":0">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(18:39:39) <Evil-Ville> load file is also broken now"..."(18:40:08) <Notch> loading should never fail from now on unless you break the file"</ref>.

== Fixes ==
* Attempted to fix bug that caused fail to load files.<ref name=":0" />

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* "Load file..." button no longer works.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(18:40:18) <Evil-Ville> the loading doesn't fail"..."(18:40:22) <Evil-Ville> i just can't load"..."(18:40:26) <Evil-Ville> pressing the button does nothing"</ref>
